Class UserInterface

  • java.lang.Object
    • titocc.gui.UserInterface
  • All Implemented Interfaces:

    public class UserInterface
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable, java.awt.event.ActionListener, javax.swing.event.DocumentListener
    Graphical frontend for the compiler. Allows opening, editing, saving and compiling source files.
